House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07907
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INCORPORATING THE VALUE OF RESPONSIBLE, FAIR USAGE AND ENJOYMENT OF SOCIAL MEDIA IN CAMPUSES NATIONWIDE, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to educate children in using the internet in the efficient and effective dissemination of information, the importance of upholding truth and the veracity of facts, figures and events, and the responsible and fair use of Social Media.
ALIAS NAME : “Social Media Awareness in Campuses Nationwide Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2018-07-30
